page.title: 06Flaxley Youth Club
page.content: I am writing about Flaxley youth group. There has been one every Friday for the last five weeks. I go every other week because I go to my dad. I go with Mrs Avery who takes me, Jess my sister, Karen, Sarah and Lynn. The age is from 6 to 10 and the older one is from 11 to 15. I go to the earlier one from six to half past seven. The older one is from half past seven to ten. I usually take 50p, it costs 25p to get in so I have got 25p left. The only game you have to pay for is the space invader, it costs 5p, half the normal price. There is a space game I do not like very much, table tennis, a magician set, connect four, a football game and a snooker table. I play on the snooker table every week when I get there. The funniest thing there is the table tennis you hit the ball everywhere, it is really funny.
